channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Keep your ActiveRecord models manageable the Rails way"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Keep your ActiveRecord models manageable the Rails way"

item.title: Suggestion from Kostas Karachalios (@vrinek)
item.description: Going back to basic Rails sounds really really interesting. Even though I like my presenters, I would love to hear a well-founded opinion from the other perspective on the matter. Always a fan of the devil's advocate :D
